resources.string:
->To View the random facts open tab "RANDOM FACTS" (which will be opened by default on app startup) and then select the fact category of your wish.

->To View the facts about particular number/year/date open tab "QUEST FACTS" select category and enter number/year/month and day (whichever is applicable) and touch the "GET FACT" Button.

->To view the facts your phone should be connected to internet.
